Posts.Content: mooseygoosey wrote: Hi everyone, I took my mammograms to a breast clinic for second opinion, and they agreed with the original radiologist that I need a biopsy.  I took you guys advice and am going with the breast people.  I am a little concerned because the biopsy isn't until thursday of next week, and today is Friday.  Is it normal for it to be that long or is that fast?  When I had originally called the breast center, they said sometimes you can get an appointment the same day or within a day or two. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Got my date for biopsy mooseygoosey MelissaA
